Reviews.Title: “Among the worst I have ever stayed at”
Reviews.Author: ConferenceMgr
Reviews.Content: pleasure night missed connection due airlines screwup read reviews lean giving hotels benefit doubt cranky reviewers tripadvisor axe grind literally hotel slept clothes top bedspread fear sheets wouldnt suitcase soft surface fear bedbugs dead roaches scattered windowsill hallway morning shower brown water pouring eventually run shower survived stay missed connection airport offered sleep camp terminal instead
